snippet: A Briton is building a Formula One racecar with parts sourced primarily from the online auction site.
abstract: A Briton is building a Formula One racecar with parts sourced primarily from the online auction site.
lead_paragraph: Last October, at an auction in London conducted by RM, a Formula One car that raced for the Force India team in 2008 sold for more than $250,000. Kevin Anthony, a 47-year-old resident of Brighton, England, is building a grand prix racecar for less than a tenth of that price with parts gathered from eBay.

headline.main: Building a Formula One Car the eBay Way
